title: BRIEF-Marshall Monteagle To Sell Its Entire 50% Interest In Monteagle Africa To SPAR
text:
BRIEF-Marshall Monteagle To Sell Its Entire 50% Interest In Monteagle Africa To SPAR

Stock Markets 34 minutes ago (Oct 04, 2019 14:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Marshall Monteagle To Sell Its Entire 50% Interest In Monteagle Africa To SPAR Oct 4 (Reuters) - Marshall Monteagle PLC : * DISPOSAL OF SHARES IN A SUBSIDIARY AND WITHDRAWAL OF CAUTIONARY * ENTERED INTO AN AGREEMENT WITH SPAR (JO: ) GROUP LIMITED, TO DISPOSE OF ITS ENTIRE 50% INTEREST IN MONTEAGLE AFRICA LIMITED * PROPOSED DEAL FOR A MAXIMUM AMOUNT OF US$ 11.8 MILLION * PROCEEDS OF DISPOSAL TO BE USED BY MONTEAGLE CONSUMER TO INCREASE WORKING CAPITAL FOR ONGOING TRADE IN FMCG

BRIEF-Marshall Monteagle To Sell Its Entire 50% Interest In Monteagle Africa To SPAR
description: BRIEF-Marshall Monteagle To Sell Its Entire 50% Interest In Monteagle Africa To SPAR
